Side Effects: I don't like the texture of the powder.  It does not mix well.  However_ it is totally worth it!!
Comments: I don't take this everyday.....mostly if I know I'm going to be eating out or some kind of event.  I do not have to center my whole life around a bathroom anymore!

This is a miracle drug for me.  I've had "dumping sydrome" after gall bladder removal - bile dumps directly into intestines and works as a laxative.  This med binds it and really helps. I also have Crohn's disease.
Wow_ this is the first medication which works  My doctor does not know why it works.
